ComicInfo.Summary:
FINAL ISSUE! Sonja has fought the idea of being a hero long enough. Will she accept membership into The Projectâ€¦and if so, is she ready for the evil she must face? By DAN ABNETT (Guardians Of The Galaxy) and JONATHAN LAU (Red Sonja)!
